body.name: ELLAI Smart Toilet with Bidet Built In, One-piece Bidet Toilet with Auto-Flush, Warm Water, Air Drying Function, Heated Seat, Bathrooms Modern Elongated Toilet with LED Display
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
features: 【AUTO-FLUSH】: This bidet toilet features an automatic flushing mechanism that eliminates the need for manual flushing. With its smart sensors, the toilet detects when you're finished, and flushes accordingly, helping to reduce water usage and ensure maximum hygiene.

【MULTI-FUNCTIONAL WASHING】: The multi-functional washing feature of this intelligent toilet offers a comprehensive and customized cleaning experience. With options for front and rear washing, adjustable water pressure and temperature, and pulsating spray modes, you can personalize your cleaning routine to your preferences.

【AIR DRYING】: This smart toilet comes equipped with a built-in air dryer that eliminates the need for toilet paper, providing a convenient and eco-friendly way to dry off after cleaning. The air dryer offers adjustable temperature and strength settings to ensure a comfortable and effective drying experience.

【HEATS in ONE SECOND】: With its innovative heating technology, this one piece toilet heats up in just one second, providing instant warmth and comfort. Whether you're in a rush or just looking for a more relaxing bathroom experience, the rapid heating feature of this toilet ensures that you'll never have to wait for warm water or seating again.

【SIPHONIC JET FLUSHING TECH】: This intelligent toilet features siphonic jet flushing technology, which uses powerful jets of water to clear waste and keep the toilet bowl clean. This flushing mechanism is highly effective and efficient, helping to reduce water usage and ensure maximum hygiene.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Cleaning 2 Comfort/ Convenience 3 Safety

ELLAI Integrated Smart Bidet Toilet Make your hands clean and bathroom fresh. It has all the functions that you can imagine and more.you will be thrilled with auto flushing and all the bidet features. Perfect gift for your family and friends ! This is a perfect gift for your beloved wife，aging parents,close friend and anyone who didn't try it.Women wash and butt wash/Adjustable water temperature/Drying fan/Heated seat/LED light/Remote control

BIDET FUNCTION Use steps: open the bidet with remote control.a hole above：butt wash/three holes below: women wash/butt wash&women wash switch: press the butt washing button, the nozzle extends and sprays water.press women wash button again, the nozzle is retracted, then it switchs to the women wash function. SELF CLEAN FUNCTION The bidet will self clean after useThe nozzie is removable, you can clean it manually if necessary

DRYING FAN TEMPERATURE TEST Three levels of air temperature: low, medium, high.The drying time is 4min, and the high-grade air temperature is 45℃-60℃/113-140℉ NICE HEATED SEAT FUNCTION Heated seat is fully adjustable you can turn it off as well if that is not for you (but it’s great) Three seat temperatures: low, medium and high.The temperature at each point is between 35-42°C/95-107.6℉

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS Product Dimensions: 26.96 inches deep, 15.94 inches wide, and 18.7 inches highProduct Weight: 105.82 poundsToilet Gallons Per Flush: 1.05 gallonsRough In Size: 12 inchesS – Trap: 1.97 inches in diameter FRIENDLY SERVICE TEAM BASED ON US If you have any before-sale service or package questions, please kindly check phone call number on package,email.Our US support team wil solve it for you within 24 hours at 8:30 a.m. - 5 p.m., EST, Mon. - Fri.You will get professional and smooth US local service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Had problems 2 months after installation.
reviews.reviewText: Toilet was fantastic at first. Then problems. Water pressure from nozzle doesn't adjust, never noticed before so not sure when it started. Then during use, hot water went cold mid stream and will no longer get hot or warm, just cold. THEN, display showing error and toilet didn't work, have to power off then back on to get it to work again, still no warm or hot water. Called number in manual for assistance, they said they no longer handle toilets and gave me another number. Called that number during stated business hours and no answer, 2 times. Left voicemails both times still have not received a call back. Called Amazon and they are sending replacement. WHAT a hassle, and how long will new one work? very disappointed, Amazon should stop selling their products without Manufacture assistance.
